valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Sun 2 Nov 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 3 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low Bailey 974 losing its identity by 0600 tomorrow. Atlantic low expected 400 miles west of Rockall 962 by same time
